meanings.definition: Make known (information that was previously kept secret)
meanings.sent1: She divulges her secret to her best friend.
meanings.sent2: He always divulges his plans to his family.
meanings.sent3: The cat divulges the hiding spot of the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise slowly divulges its beauty to the world.
meanings.sent5: The detective finally divulges the identity of the culprit.

meanings.sent1: The journalist divulges the scandal to the public.
meanings.sent2: They never divulge their passwords to anyone.
meanings.sent3: The parrot divulges the embarrassing story to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds slowly divulge their impending rain.
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick finally divulges its secrets to the audience.
